title: The COVID Goal Post Moves Again (Ep 1664)
description:
They moved the COVID goal post again! In this episode I address the latest attempt by the corona bros to use this crisis to destroy your civil liberties. 

News Picks:

The link between coronavirus and obesity is strong.

Economic red flags are everywhere as productivity continues to crater.


Jussie Smollett’s attorneys make the most ridiculous closing argument I’ve ever heard. 


President Trump’s former chief of staff signals a 2024 run.
